getTopLevelByCategory: select t.* from weapon_base as t where not exists (select p.name from weapon_base as p where p.previous = t.name) and t.weapon_type=:type
getWeaponByQuery: select * from weapon_base where weapon_type=:type and element1=:element and (case when slot_1 > 0 then 1 else 0 end) + (case when slot_2 > 0 then 1 else 0 end) + (case when slot_3 > 0 then 1 else 0 end) > :num_slots
getBowgunsByRequirement: select * from weapon_base where weapon_type=:type and affinity > :affinity and (case when slot_1 > 0 then 1 else 0 end) + (case when slot_2 > 0 then 1 else 0 end) + (case when slot_3 > 0 then 1 else 0 end) > :num_slots
